item.title: open-uri
item.description:
TIL open-uri internally patches Kernel.open allowing remote code execution and reading local files. If the string provided to open-uri starts with a pipe it will get executed as a command: require "open-uri" irb(main):001:0> require 'open-uri' => true irb(main):002:0> open('|ls').to_a => ["content
", "data
", "layouts
", "resources
"] For more information check this resource.
